p: A group of 12 EO at three different doses ( Table 1) were selected based on previous studies [ 18, 19, 20], the Rumen Up project ( https://www.abdn.ac.uk/research/rumen-up/ accessed on 18 September 2018), commercial availability, reasonable price and legal status in the EU. All EO were supplied by TECHNA France Nutrition (CouÃ«ron, France).
